ways.title: Ways to Make a Difference
ways.intro: Your support helps us continue our life-changing work all over the continent.

items.title: Give Financially
items.text: Your donations provide education, medical care, food, and shelter for children in need.

items.title: Sponsor a Child
items.text: Change a child's life through monthly sponsorship providing education, healthcare, and basic needs.

items.title: Volunteer
items.text: Use your skills and time to make an impact, either in Africa or remotely from your home.

items.title: Other Ways
items.text: Fundraise, advocate, include us in your will, or donate stocks - there are many ways to help!

sponsor.title: Sponsor a Child
sponsor.intro: Child sponsorship provides education, healthcare, nutrition, and hope to vulnerable children in Africa. For just $39/month, you can transform a child's life.

items.title: Quality Education
items.text: Covers school fees, uniforms, supplies, and tutoring for your sponsored child.

items.title: Healthcare
items.text: Provides medical checkups, treatment, and preventive care.

items.title: Basic Needs
items.text: Ensures nutritious meals, clean water, and safe shelter.
